ygData.subject: RE: New Paw, old tricks
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh yeah, my druid went from 15 to 16 in one night too.  Too bad bards can t snare at that level, much less fight yellows solo.  I made 16 an amazing 9
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh yeah, my druid went from 15 to 16 in one night too. Too bad bards
can't snare at that level, much less fight yellows solo. I made 16 an
amazing 9 times. Brrrr, 15th. Yech. Haven't died 9 times total since and
0 times at 20th.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Friday, December 17, 1999 8:56 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Paw, old tricks


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> The incident happened way back in June. Yes I was 15th level for 2.5
> months. I cannot think of any level I have hated more so far. The last 2
> levels have breezed by with no more playing time than usual.

Wowsers. I took my druid from L15 -> L16 in one night, yesterday.
;) You gotta love gorge hounds and dark stalkers (white/yellow).

Snare, Panic, Swarm, Flame, Whack, Whack, repeat.

ehehe...

Datago 'Catnip' (Harmonic).

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
